title: Uploading streaming media content to Azure
content: I have been working at Swank Motion Pictures on a SmartTV application to offer a cloud-based on-demand streaming movie service. To do this, we upload our content to Azure Media Services assets and use OnDemand and SAS locators to stream the content on the TV. I have extracted a couple small metho

title: How to use libgit2sharp to commit to Git repositories in C# ?
content: I helped design an interesting deployment strategy for an Azure application. For one of our projects, we have an existing upgrade solution that will distribute new versions of our ASP.NET application to our clients. One of our clients runs in the app in Azure.
